patthana2.2:141.14: vatthuṃ anidassane khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.2:141.16: anidassanādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:142.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:142.3: anidassanādhipati sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:143.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:143.3: anidassanādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:145.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:145.2: purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:147.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … nissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:149.1: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:149.12: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:150.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:150.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.2:152.1: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:152.2: sanidassanaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.2:152.5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:153.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:153.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa … pe … phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:154.1: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:154.3: Rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:156.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:156.2: pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:157.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:157.2: pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:158.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:158.2: pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:160.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:160.2: purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.2:162.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:162.4: anidassanā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:162.8: anidassanā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ anidassanānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:163.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:164.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:166.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (tīsupi kabaḷīkāro āhāro kātabbo) …
patthana2.2:166.7: jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.2:168.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:168.4: anidassanā khandhā anidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:168.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe anidassanā khandhā anidassanānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:168.6: khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:168.14: anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:169.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:169.4: anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:169.8: anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:170.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:170.4: anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:170.8: anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:172.1: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:172.4: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:173.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:173.4: anidassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.2:173.15: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.2:173.25: anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:174.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:174.4: anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:174.7: mahābhūtā sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:174.11: asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūtā sanidassanānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ, upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:174.13: anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:175.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:175.4: anidassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.2:175.10: mahābhūtā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, kaṭattārūpānaṃ, upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:175.14: asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūtā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:176.1: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:176.3: rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:177.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:180.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:183.1: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:184.1: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:185.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:186.1: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:187.1: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:191.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye cattāri, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca (sabbattha pañca), nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:195.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi … pe … nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:199.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi … pe … magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:206.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:206.2: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, dve mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … rasāyatanaṃ. #1
patthana2.2:207.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:207.2: sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca āpodhātu, sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ paṭicca āpodhātu itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #2
patthana2.2:208.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:208.2: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā āpodhātu ca, dve mahābhūte … pe …
patthana2.2:208.4: sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.2:208.6: rasāyatanaṃ āpodhātu itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #3
patthana2.2:209.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:209.2: appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:209.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #1
patthana2.2:210.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:210.2: appaṭighe khandhe paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.2:210.5: āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighā mahābhūtā, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. #2
patthana2.2:211.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:211.2: appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:211.8: āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #3
patthana2.2:212.1: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:212.2: appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.2:212.5: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca dve mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana2.2:212.7: sappaṭighe mahābhūte ca āpodhātuñca paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … rasāyatanaṃ. #1
patthana2.2:213.1: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:213.2: appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.2:213.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #2
patthana2.2:214.1: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:214.2: appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.2:214.5: appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … rasāyatanaṃ, itthindriyaṃ … pe … kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #3
patthana2.2:216.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.2:216.2: appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:218.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi vajjetabbā, kaṭattārūpā ca) …
patthana2.2:218.6: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, dve mahābhūte … pe …. #1
patthana2.2:219.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana2.2:220.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana2.2:220.2: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā āpodhātu ca, dve mahābhūte … pe …. #3
patthana2.2:221.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana2.2:221.2: appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:221.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. #1
patthana2.2:222.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—

patthana2.2:223.2: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca dve mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana2.2:226.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
patthana2.2:230.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:231.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:231.2: ahetukaṃ appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:231.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paṭicca itthindriyaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.2:231.17: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.2:232.1: (Appaṭighamūlakaṃ itarepi dve pañhā kātabbā. Ghaṭanepi tīṇi pañhā kātabbā. Ajjhattikā bāhirā mahābhūtā sabbe jānitvā kātabbā.)
patthana2.2:234.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā (sabbaṃ saṃkhittaṃ) …
patthana2.2:237.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava, naāhāre nava, naindriye nava, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.2:241.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.2:245.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava … pe … magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.

patthana2.2:254.8: āpodhātuṃ paccayā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, āpodhātuṃ paccayā itthindriyaṃ … pe …
patthana2.2:254.10: kabaḷīkāro āhāro, vatthuṃ paccayā appaṭighā khandhā. #1
patthana2.2:257.1: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.2:258.1: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.2:258.2: appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:259.1: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.2:259.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana2.2:259.4: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca kāyāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana2.2:262.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.2:266.1: (Saṃsaṭṭhavārepi sabbattha ekaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ. Avigatapaccayā, ekāyeva pañhā. Dvepi vārā kātabbā.)
patthana2.2:271.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:271.2: appaṭighā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:272.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:272.2: appaṭighā hetū sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:273.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:273.2: appaṭighā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:275.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:275.7: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:275.12: sappaṭighā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:276.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:276.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:276.7: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:276.8: ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti;
patthana2.2:276.14: āpodhātuṃ, kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.2:276.17: cetopariyañāṇena appaṭighacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.2:276.21: appaṭighā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:278.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:278.5: phoṭṭhabbe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana2.2:279.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:279.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:279.9: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:279.15: āpodhātuṃ, kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.2:279.17: appaṭighādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:280.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:280.3: appaṭighādhipati sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:281.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:281.3: appaṭighādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:283.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:285.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana2.2:287.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … cha … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.

patthana2.2:290.10: kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhojanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …

patthana2.2:293.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:293.6: itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, āpodhātuṃ, kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.2:294.1: Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā appaṭighassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:294.5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca appaṭighānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.2:296.4: Pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:296.6: Pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:298.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.2:300.8: appaṭighā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:301.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.2:301.8: appaṭighā cetanā sappaṭighānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:302.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:302.4: appaṭighā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:302.8: appaṭighā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:304.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:306.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:306.2: appaṭighā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:306.7: (Avasesā dvepi pañhā kātabbā, paṭisandhi kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvīsupi kātabbo agge.) #3
patthana2.2:308.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:309.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (tīsupi jīvitindriyaṃ agge kātabbaṃ). #3

patthana2.2:312.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:313.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:313.4: appaṭighā khandhā appaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:313.7: khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:313.11: appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa appaṭighassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:314.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:314.4: appaṭighā khandhā sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:314.8: appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:315.1: Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:315.4: appaṭighā khandhā sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:315.8: appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:317.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.2:318.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.2:318.3: sappaṭighā mahābhūtā āpodhātuyā atthipaccayena paccayo, sappaṭighā mahābhūtā appaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:318.18: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.2:319.1: Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:319.2: sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ āpodhātuyā ca atthipaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana2.2:320.1: Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.2:320.14: kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.2:320.19: appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa appaṭighassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.2:321.8: āpodhātu sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.2:322.4: appaṭigho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañca appaṭighānañca … pe ….

patthana2.2:322.10: imassa sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:323.1: Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā sappaṭighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.2:467.1: Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.2:468.1: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:470.1: Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:471.1: Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:472.1: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:473.1: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:473.2: cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.2:475.1: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.2:477.1: Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:477.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:478.1: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:478.4: arūpino khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:478.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpino khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:478.8: arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:480.1: Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:481.1: Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:481.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:481.8: kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.2:481.11: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:482.1: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:482.2: arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.2:483.1: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:483.4: arūpino khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:483.8: arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:484.1: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:484.2: arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.2:485.1: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:485.4: arūpī khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:485.8: arūpino khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:485.10: arūpino khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:486.1: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:486.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.2:486.10: arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.2:486.14: paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …. #2
patthana2.2:487.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:490.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate satta.
patthana2.2:493.1: Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:494.1: Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:495.1: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:496.1: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:497.1: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:498.1: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #1
patthana2.2:499.1: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #2
patthana2.2:503.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta … pe … namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:507.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:511.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā), avigate satta.
patthana2.2:518.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:518.2: lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:518.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.2:518.10: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.2:519.1: Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:519.2: lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.2:520.1: Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:521.1: Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:521.2: lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.2:522.1: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:522.2: lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.2:525.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:529.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:529.2: ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:529.8: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.2:532.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca (naāsevanamūlake lokuttare suddhake vipākoti niyāmetabbaṃ, avasesā pakatikāyeva), nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:536.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve (naanantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā) … pe … navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:540.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.2:548.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:548.6: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā lokiyā khandhā. #1
patthana2.2:549.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:550.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:550.2: vatthuṃ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.2:551.1: Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:552.1: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:552.2: lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.2:553.1: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:553.2: lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #2
patthana2.2:554.1: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:554.2: lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:554.6: lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.2:557.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … magge nava, sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.2:561.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:561.6: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā lokiyā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.2:564.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava (lokuttare arūpe vipākanti niyāmetabbaṃ), nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:568.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi (nasamanantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā), navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:572.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.2:580.1: Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:580.2: lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.2:581.1: Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.2:581.2: lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.2:582.1: (Saṃsaṭṭhavāro evaṃ vitthāretabbo, saha gaṇanāhi dve pañhā.)
patthana2.2:589.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:589.2: lokiyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:590.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:592.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:592.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā … pe …
patthana2.2:592.8: ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.2:592.13: vatthuṃ lokiye khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.2:592.16: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:592.17: Cetopariyañāṇena lokiyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.2:592.23: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, lokiyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:593.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:594.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:594.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:594.3: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:594.4: ariyā cetopariyañāṇena lokuttaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, lokuttarā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:596.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:596.12: sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:596.15: vatthuṃ lokiye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.2:596.17: lokiyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:597.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:598.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:598.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:599.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:599.3: lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.2:601.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:601.2: purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.2:602.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:602.5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:603.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:603.2: purimā purimā lokuttarā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:603.3: maggo phalassa, phalaṃ phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.2:604.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:606.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo (pañca pañhā, ghaṭanā natthi) aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:608.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:608.5: lokiyaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.2:608.7: vipassanaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.2:609.1: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:609.5: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.2:609.7: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.2:610.1: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.2:610.5: paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
